verses.verse: Come <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%> without a <S%H3678>throne<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>: for thou shalt no <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate<s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> the <S%H7347>millstones<s%>, and <S%H2912>grind<s%> <S%H7058>meal<s%>; <S%H1540>remove<s%> thy <S%H6777>veil<s%>, <S%H2834>strip<s%> off the <S%H7640>train<s%>, <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H7785>leg<s%>, pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.

Thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered<s%>, <S%H2781>yea<s%>, thy shame shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%>: I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, and will <S%H6293>spare<s%> no <S%H120>man<s%>.
Our <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Sit <S%H3427><s%> thou <S%H1748>silent<s%>, and <S%H935>get<s%> thee into <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>; for thou shalt no <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> The <S%H1404>mistress<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>.

I was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with my <S%H5971>people<s%>, I <S%H2490>profaned<s%> mine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: thou didst <S%H7760>show<s%> them no <S%H7356>mercy<s%>; upon the <S%H2205>aged<s%> hast thou <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>heavily<s%> laid thy <S%H5923>yoke<s%>.

And thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, I shall be <S%H1404>mistress<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; so that thou didst not <S%H7760>lay<s%> these things to thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>, neither didst <S%H2142>remember<s%> the latter end <S%H319>thereof<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5719>this<s%>, thou that art given to pleasures, that <S%H3427>sittest<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%>, that <S%H559>sayest<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, I <S%H657>am<s%>, and there is none else besides <S%H3427>me<s%>; I shall not sit as a <S%H490>widow<s%>, neither shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> the loss of <S%H7908>children<s%>:

but these <S%H8147>two<s%> things shall <S%H935>come<s%> to thee in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, the loss of <S%H7908>children<s%>, and <S%H489>widowhood<s%>; in their full <S%H8537>measure<s%> shall they <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H7230>thee<s%>, in the multitude of thy <S%H3785>sorceries<s%>, and the <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6109>abundance<s%> of thine <S%H2267>enchantments<s%>.

For thou hast <S%H982>trusted<s%> in thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>; thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, None <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H2451>me<s%>; thy wisdom and thy <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, it hath <S%H7725>perverted<s%> <S%H559>thee<s%>, and thou hast said in thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>, I <S%H657>am<s%>, and there is none else besides me.

Therefore shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H3045>thee<s%>; thou shalt not know the <S%H7837>dawning<s%> <S%H1943>thereof<s%>: and mischief shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon <S%H3201>thee<s%>; thou shalt not be able to put it <S%H3722>away<s%>: and <S%H7722>desolation<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon thee <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>, which thou knowest <S%H3045>not<s%>.

Stand <S%H5975><s%> now with thine <S%H2267>enchantments<s%>, and with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H3785>sorceries<s%>, <S%H834>wherein<s%> thou hast <S%H3021>labored<s%> from thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>; if so be thou shalt be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3276>profit<s%>, if so be thou mayest <S%H6206>prevail<s%>.

Thou art <S%H3811>wearied<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H6098>counsels<s%>: let now the <S%H1895>astrologers<s%>, the <S%H2374>star-gazers<s%>, the <S%H2320>monthly<s%> <S%H3045>prognosticators<s%>, stand <S%H5975>up<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> thee from the things that shall come upon <S%H935>thee<s%>.

Behold <S%H7179><s%>, they shall be as stubble; the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H5337>them<s%>; they shall not deliver <S%H5315>themselves<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3852>flame<s%>: it shall not be a <S%H1513>coal<s%> to <S%H2552>warm<s%> <S%H217>at<s%>, nor a fire to sit <S%H3427>before<s%>.

Thus shall the things be unto thee wherein thou hast <S%H3021>labored<s%>: they that have <S%H5503>trafficked<s%> with thee from thy <S%H5271>youth<s%> shall <S%H8582>wander<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H5676>quarter<s%>; there shall be none to save <S%H3467>thee<s%>.
